name: Patina Brewing Co. Brew House & BBQ
address: 2332 Marpole Ave, Port Coquitlam, BC V3C 2A2, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Texas Brisket (6 Oz)
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Dairy free. Brisket simply seasoned with salt, coarse pepper and herbs, smoked for fourteen hours in true Texas post oak. It’s a labour of love.

hasMenuItem.name: Creamy Mac N’ Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Our irresistible creamy mac n’ cheese with house made sauce and a pinch of our Patina rub. Add pulled pork (2oz) or brisket (2oz) for an extra cost.

hasMenuItem.name: Patina Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Gluten free. Fresh cut Kennebec potatoes, fried crispy and tossed in our Patina house rub.

hasMenuItem.name: Southern Cornbread
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Baked fresh in-house from scratch. Served with a side of blackberry honey butter.

hasMenuItem.name: Smokehouse Chicken Wings
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Dairy free. Choice of Alabama white or Hazy hot.

hasMenuItem.name: Smoked Brussels Sprouts (8 Oz)
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Gluten free. Delicately smoked for two hours and deep fried until crispy, topped with your choice of Alabama white or sweet chili sauce. Superfood, now super tasty!

hasMenuItem.name: Smoked Chicken Leg (2 Pieces)
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Dairy free. Four hours in our smoker, then lightly deep fried to create an irresistible crispy skin. You can’t skip leg day.

hasMenuItem.name: Pit Beans
hasMenuItem.description: Vegan. Gluten free. Tender pinto beans simmered in house-made molasses and tomato sauce, and then smoked for three hours.

hasMenuItem.name: Pulled Pork (6 Oz)
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Dairy free. Seasoned with our signature Patina pork rub and smoked for a minimum of ten hours for tenderness and smoky flavour. No autographs please.

hasMenuItem.name: Candied Bacon
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Dairy free. Yes, yes we did!

hasMenuItem.name: Smoked Meat Bunwich
hasMenuItem.description: Your choice of pulled pork or brisket smoked meat on a bun, topped with your choice of BBQ sauce and house smoked garlic mayo. Served with coleslaw and fries (sub a half salad for an extra cost).

hasMenuItem.name: Pork Ribs (Full Rack)
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Dairy free. Over a pound of pork ribs, seasoned, smoked smoked in-house for over four hours, and charbroiled. It’s worth every step.

hasMenuItem.name: Poco Hat - Patina Red
hasMenuItem.description: Be poco proud! Snag one of our stylish port coquitlam signet hats. Brown sugar waxed canvas with a flat brim and dark brown adjustable snapback. Poco embroidered in patina red with patina brewing co\. Down the side in antique white.

hasMenuItem.name: PoCo Toque
hasMenuItem.description: Keep your noggin’ toasty this winter in our heather knit beanie. Features a cuffed design with a sewn-on patina patch.

hasMenuItem.name: Patina Trucker Hat
hasMenuItem.description: Our fashion-forward classic five-panel snapback in light grey herringbone tweed. Black mesh with black adjustable snapback. Adorned with our flat embroidered Patina Brewing Co. sewn-on patch.

hasMenuItem.name: Patina Toque
hasMenuItem.description: Keep your noggin’ toasty this winter in our heather knit beanie. Features a cuffed design with a sewn-on patina patch.

hasMenuItem.name: Sleeve Glass
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy the full Patina Brewing Co. Experience at home, with your own 16 oz sleeve glass, adorned with a screen-printed patina logo. Dishwasher safe.

hasMenuItem.name: Growler - Glass Only
hasMenuItem.description: An empty glass growler, ready to be filled with your favourite patina brew! Makes a great gift for the beer-lover in your life, alongside a patina gift card so they can choose their own beer adventure.

hasMenuItem.name: Pint Glass
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy the full Patina Brewing Co. Experience at home, with your own 20 oz pint glass, adorned with a screen-printed patina logo. Dishwasher safe.

hasMenuSection.name: From The Kitchen - Beer Drinkin’ Snacks

hasMenuItem.name: Smokehouse Chicken Wings
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Dairy free. Choice of Alabama white or Hazy hot.

hasMenuItem.name: Rib Tail Bites
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Dairy free. A full pound of crispy rib tails, sprinkled in our brisket seasoning and a drizzle of our lemongrass BBQ sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Queso Dip With Warm Tortillas
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Gluten free. Our cheese sauce spiked with fire roasted tomatoes, red peppers & fresh jalapeños served alongside a pile of house-made made warm tortilla chips.

hasMenuItem.name: Candied Bacon
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Dairy free. Yes, yes we did!

hasMenuItem.name: The Double Dipper
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Our spinach & queso dips served together with house-made warm tortillas. Add a hummus too for an extra cost.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicharrones
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. A salty snack of pork rinds to enjoy with any Patina beer!

hasMenuItem.name: Retro Spinach Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Our spinach dip served cold with house-made warm tortilla chips. It’s a classic, why change it?

hasMenuItem.name: Tofu Wings
hasMenuItem.description: Vegan. Gluten free. Sunflower parmesan encrusted tofu bites. Easy to share and easy to like tofu!

hasMenuItem.name: Fresh Veggies
hasMenuItem.description: Vegan. Gluten free (without dip). Fresh seasonal vegetables served with a side of our Alabama white sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Texas Brisket (6 Oz)
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Dairy free. Brisket simply seasoned with salt, coarse pepper and herbs, smoked for fourteen hours in true Texas post oak. It’s a labour of love.

hasMenuItem.name: Pork Ribs (Full Rack)
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Dairy free. Over a pound of pork ribs, seasoned, smoked smoked in-house for over four hours, and charbroiled. It’s worth every step.

hasMenuItem.name: Smoked Chicken Leg (2 Pieces)
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Dairy free. Four hours in our smoker, then lightly deep fried to create an irresistible crispy skin. You can’t skip leg day.

hasMenuItem.name: Pulled Pork (6 Oz)
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Dairy free. Seasoned with our signature Patina pork rub and smoked for a minimum of ten hours for tenderness and smoky flavour. No autographs please.

hasMenuItem.name: Patina Mild Sausage (2 Pieces)
hasMenuItem.description: Dairy free. A pair of locally made pork sausages, loaded with our beer and grilled to perfection. Enough said.

hasMenuItem.name: Smoked Brussels Sprouts (8 Oz)
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Gluten free. Delicately smoked for two hours and deep fried until crispy, topped with your choice of Alabama white or sweet chili sauce. Superfood, now super tasty!

hasMenuItem.name: Jackfruit (6 Oz)
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Gluten free. A favourite vegetarian option for BBQ joints. Pulled jackfruit is served in our Memphis BBQ sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Smokehouse Chicken & Waffles
hasMenuItem.description: Two pieces of our smoked in-house chicken legs & two Belgian waffles. Served with a drizzle of house hot sauce and syrup.

hasMenuItem.name: Smoked Meat Bunwich
hasMenuItem.description: Your choice of pulled pork or brisket smoked meat on a bun, topped with your choice of BBQ sauce and house smoked garlic mayo. Served with coleslaw and fries (sub a half salad for an extra cost).

hasMenuItem.name: Pulled Pork Tacos
hasMenuItem.description: Three corn tortillas filled with pulled pork and coleslaw. Topped with BBQ sauce. Served cold.

hasMenuItem.name: Patina Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Gluten free. Fresh cut Kennebec potatoes, fried crispy and tossed in our Patina house rub.

hasMenuItem.name: Southern Cornbread
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Baked fresh in-house from scratch. Served with a side of blackberry honey butter.

hasMenuItem.name: Pit Beans
hasMenuItem.description: Vegan. Gluten free. Tender pinto beans simmered in house-made molasses and tomato sauce, and then smoked for three hours.

hasMenuItem.name: Creamy Mac N’ Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Our irresistible creamy mac n’ cheese with house made sauce and a pinch of our Patina rub. Add pulled pork (2oz) or brisket (2oz) for an extra cost.

hasMenuItem.name: Coleslaw
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Fresh house made coleslaw tossed in our signature creamy dressing is perfect addition to any meal.

hasMenuItem.name: Memphis BBQ Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Gluten free. Our Memphis style sauce is for the barbecue lovers that prefer their sauce a little on the sweeter side (aw, shucks!). It has a delicate balance of acidity and sweetness and pairs well with our pork ribs and pulled pork.

hasMenuItem.name: Alabama White BBQ Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. A tasty sauce specific to Alabama. This is not a traditional ketchup-based barbecue sauce. It is a balanced white sauce that pairs well with our chicken legs and wings.

hasMenuItem.name: Texas BBQ Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. A rich adaptation of the classic Texas style sauce. A little spicy, but loaded with delicious caramel flavour and black pepper. Pairs perfectly with our brisket.

hasMenuItem.name: Hazy Hot Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. We start with our Juicy IPA, then load it with citrus notes as well a nice kick of heat from the habanero and jalapeño peppers. This is a great addition to any dish to amp up the spice factor.

hasMenuItem.name: Bottled BBQ Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Choose your favourite Patina BBQ sauce, bottled to go so you can enjoy it at home! 12 oz.

hasMenuItem.name: Fresh Baked Cookies
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Ask your server what our chef has baked up today!

review.reviewBody: this is some of the best barbecue I have ever had.
Amazing beers (try the Juicy IPA or the DIPA) and the best BBQ chicken in town!
love this place so much we've become regulars! always great service and delicious food
